participant_1.background:
My family is my biggest treasure.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I went to an interfaith event last year, and it was really wonderful to see people from different religions come together in prayer.
i take things very literally.
I do not have my own home yet.

participant_2.background:
I remember buying my first ice cream cone when I was four.
I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
I like trains, and my grandma makes jewelry.
I wear comfortable clothing that allows me to move freely.
i enjoy john grisham movies , but not his books.

content.text: Hi! I'm looking for a new job. Do you have any openings?
I got fired from my last job for speaking my mind too much.
Oh, sorry to hear that. I try to be careful about what I say.
I wear comfortable clothing that allows me to move freely.
That sounds good. I need to be able to move around a lot too.
I like trains, and my grandma makes jewelry.
That's interesting. I've never been on a train before.
I remember buying my first ice cream cone when I was four.
That's a great memory! I love ice cream too.
I enjoy John Grisham movies, but not his books.
I've never read any of his books. I'm more of a Stephen King fan.
I've read a few of his books. I liked Misery.
